title: We Need a Plan. Here it is. (Ep 1436)
description:
In this episode, I discuss the stunning new DOJ complaint alleging that a liberal activist was part of the Capitol attack. I also discuss the information likely to come out in the last minute declassification of the Spygate files. 

News Picks:


BLM activist exposed in the incident at the Capitol.

Twitter and Facebook suffer tremendous losses after banning Trump. 


More on the Fiona Hill controversy.

Is everything broken? 


Delta bans passengers for questioning Romney and Graham.

Amazons sells a variety of items promoting violence. Should they be deplatformed?
